name: Riso Pong
description:
Riso Pong, a game by offalynne, with audio by HeavyViper, created March 7, 2018 for FEMICOM Game Jam #4: Make cute PONG!

Inspired by the art of Nathalie du Pasquier and Rachel Weil.

Known issues: Game runs too fast on high refresh rate monitors due to upstream bug. See YoyoGames MantisDB issue #2772.
